name: Canvas Cave
description:
** Check out my other Game Jams :) **

An impromptu decision to make a game for Lame Jam 26

The theme of 'Control the Environment' caught my eye. I've wanted to muck around with Godot's autotile feature and this was a great way to dig in. I think there's some cool ideas in this little game but given the limited timeframe the level design is lacking.
Happy with how it turned out though! Please let me know what you think of it :)

** How to play **

Collect terrain from the green buckets
Collect jump pads from the mushroom chests
Place terrain with Left-Click
Place jump pads with Right-Click
IF ROBO-WHEEL-MAN STOPS MOVING, HE DIES!!

CREDITS

Everything except art assets by Tim 'BronxTaco' Day (my first fully solo Jam!!)
Made with Godot 3
Music made in Famitracker
SFX made with BFXR
Tims Gamedev Discord

ASSETS 

Art assets from craftpix
Mouse icon graphics from astralpixel
